br.uff.midiacom.ana.connector
Class NCLSimpleAction<T extends NCLElement,Ep extends NCLConnectorParam,Er extends NCLRoleElement,Eb extends NCLBind>

java.lang.Object
  br.uff.midiacom.ana.util.xml.XMLElementPrototype<T>
      br.uff.midiacom.ana.util.ncl.NCLElementPrototype<T>
          br.uff.midiacom.ana.connector.ParamElement<T>
              br.uff.midiacom.ana.connector.NCLSimpleAction<T,Ep,Er,Eb>
Type Parameters:

I -
Ea -
Er -
Ep -
R -
All Implemented Interfaces:
NCLAction<T,Ep,Er>, NCLRoleElement<Eb>, NCLElement<T>, ReferredElement<Eb>, XMLElement<T>
public class NCLSimpleAction<T extends NCLElement,Ep extends NCLConnectorParam,Er extends NCLRoleElement,Eb extends NCLBind>
extends ParamElement<T>
implements NCLAction<T,Ep,Er>, NCLRoleElement<Eb>

Class that represents a connector simple action.
This element defines the attributes:

  • role - action identification. This attribute is required.
  • delay - delay waited by the action. This attribute is optional.
  • eventType - type of event. This attribute is optional.
  • actionType - transition triggered. This attribute is optional.
  • value - value to be set if the action is an attribution. This attribute is optional.
  • min - minimum cardinality of the action. This attribute is optional.
  • max - maximum cardinality of the action. This attribute is optional.
  • qualifier - relates the action instances when its cardinality is greater than 1. This attribute is optional.
  • repeat - number of times the action will be repeated. This attribute is optional.
  • repeatDelay - delay between repetitions. This attribute is optional.
  • duration - duration of an attribution. This attribute is optional.
  • by - increment of the attributed value during the interval. This attribute is optional.

Method Detail

setRole

public void setRole(java.lang.Object role)
             throws XMLException
Sets the connector interface point, used to identify this simple action This attribute is required and can not be set to null.
The role must be unique inside the connector.
The role may be set as a string value or a value from the NCLDefaultActionRole enumeration.

Parameters:
role - string or a value from the enumeration NCLDefaultActionRole representing the role name.
Throws:
XMLException - if the role is null or of the wrong type.

getRole

public java.lang.Object getRole()
Returns the connector interface point, used to identify this simple action or null if the attribute is not defined.
The role must be unique inside the connector.
The role may be set as a string value or a value from the NCLDefaultActionRole enumeration.

Specified by:
getRole in interface NCLRoleElement<Eb extends NCLBind>
Returns:
string or a value from the enumeration NCLDefaultActionRole representing the role name or null if the attribute is not defined.

setValue

public void setValue(java.lang.Object value)
              throws XMLException
Sets the value to be set if the action is an attribution. This attribute is optional. Set the value to null to erase a value already defined.
The value can be set as a parameter, in which case its value is defined by the link that uses the connector where this action is.
In case the attribute value is defined by a parameter, the parameter must be defined in the same connector where this simple action it.

Parameters:
value - string or connector parameter representing the value for the attribution or null to erase a value already defined.
Throws:
XMLException - if the value is of the wrong type.

            throws XMLException
Sets the minimum cardinality of the simple action. This attribute is optional. Set the minimum to null to erase a minimum already defined.
The default minimum value is 1.

Parameters:
min - positive integer representing the minimum cardinality value or null to erase a minimum already defined.
Throws:
XMLException - if the value is negative.

The default maximum value is 1.

Parameters:
max - integer representing the maximum cardinality value, the string "unbounded" or null to erase a maximum already defined.

public java.lang.Object getMax()

The default maximum value is 1.

setQualifier

public void setQualifier(NCLActionOperator qualifier)
                  throws XMLException
Sets the relation among the action instances when its cardinality is greater than 1. This attribute is optional. Set the qualifier to null to erase a qualifier already defined.
The qualifier attribute relates the simple action instances. Its possible values are "par" and "seq" and are defined in the enumeration NCLActionOperator.
Using a "par" qualifier means that the instances of the simple action will be executed in parallel. Using a "seq" qualifier means that the instances of the simple action will be executed in sequence.
The default qualifier value is par.

Parameters:
qualifier - element representing the simple action qualifier from the enumeration NCLActionOperator or null to erase a qualifier already defined.
Throws:
XMLException

getQualifier

public NCLActionOperator getQualifier()
Returns the relation among the action instances when its cardinality is greater than 1 or null if the attribute is not defined.
The qualifier attribute relates the simple action instances. Its possible values are "par" and "seq" and are defined in the enumeration NCLActionOperator.
Using a "par" qualifier means that the instances of the simple action will be executed in parallel. Using a "seq" qualifier means that the instances of the simple action will be executed in sequence.
The default qualifier value is par.

Returns:
element representing the simple action qualifier from the enumeration NCLActionOperator or null if the attribute is not defined.
